column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I came in after work and was seated immediately for the first time!! My server KevinL was the nicest. As usually the appetizer came out very fast I had edamame and salmon poke taco. The taco was amazing!! I love samon it was surprisingly fresh I just wish it was a bit cheaper bc it was 2 baby tacos for like 6$ for ramen we had the kar-men for the first time. I really enjoyed it
column2: it was really spicy and it reminded me of like pho bc it had cilantro and bean sprouts. But my all time fav would bc the wonton chicken ramen 5/5 service 5/5 for quality
